game.name: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line: Nottingham - Lincoln Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore the eastern reaches of Midlands territory with Just Trains’ latest addition to their Midland Main Line network, which spans 34 miles from Nottingham to Lincoln!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the eastern reaches of Midlands territory with Just Trains’ latest addition to their Midland Main Line network, which spans 34 miles from Nottingham to Lincoln!
